net.sf.jclec.problem.classification

Interface IClassifier

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrispRule, CrispRuleBase, FuzzyRule, FuzzyRuleBase, Rule, RuleBase, TanClassifier

    public interface IClassifier
extends net.sf.jclec.JCLEC
    Interface for classifiers.

    Defines the methods to classify an instance classify(IInstance) and a complete dataset classify(IDataset), and a method to get the confusion matrix getConfusionMatrix(IDataset). The toString() method returns a human-readable text representation of the classifier, e.g. rule base.

    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura, Amelia Zafra, Jose M. Luna, Alberto Cano, Juan Luis Olmo
